question:
Consider the following statements about the “Rashtriya Gokul Mission”:
  1. It is a sub-mission under the National Livestock Mission
  2. The mission aims to support cattle breeding in the country through technical & non-technical manpower.
  3. The mission is being implemented through National Livestock Development Board
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
First statement is incorrect because Rashtriya Gokul Mission has been launched under the National Programme for Bovine Breeding and Dairy Development. Second statement is correct. Third statement is incorrect because the mission is being implemented through State Livestock Development Boards of respective states. The “Rashtriya Gokul Mission” was launched by the Government for conservation and development of indigenous breeds in scientific manner. The mission aims at:
  • development and conservation of indigenous bovine breeds for enhancing milk production
  • induction of high genetic merit bulls for semen production
  • setting up of Gokul Grams
  • generating awareness among farmers for rearing of indigenous breeds
  • providing training of technical & non-technical manpower
  • establishment of breeders societies
  • Induction of high genetic merit bulls for natural service etc.
